    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public void parse(int lineNumber,
         java.lang.String line,
         MZTabErrorList errorList)
           throws MZTabException
        Description copied from class: MZTabHeaderLineParser
        Parse a header line into MZTabColumnFactory structure. There are two steps in this method: Step 1: MZTabHeaderLineParser.parseStableOrderColumns() focus on validate and parse for stable columns and optional columns which have stable order; and Step 2: MZTabHeaderLineParser.parseOptionalColumns(int) focus on AbundanceColumn, OptionColumn and CVParamOptionColumn parse and validation.
        Overrides:
        parse in class MZTabHeaderLineParser
        Throws:
        MZTabException

      • refine

        protected void refine()
               throws MZTabException
        Principle 1: in "Quantification" file, following optional columns are mandatory provide: 1. protein_abundance_study_variable[1-n] 2. protein_abundance_stdev_study_variable[1-n] 3. protein_abundance_std_error_study_variable[1-n] In "Complete" and "Identification" file, following optional columns also mandatory provide: 1. search_engine_score_ms_run[1-n] 2. num_psms_ms_run[1-n] 3. num_peptides_distinct_ms_run[1-n] 4. num_peptides_unique_ms_run[1-n] Beside principle 1, in "Complete" and "Quantification" file, following optional columns also mandatory provide: 1. search_engine_score_ms_run[1-n] 2. protein_abundance_assay[1-n] NOTICE: this hock method will be called at end of parse() function.
        Specified by:
        refine in class MZTabHeaderLineParser
        Throws:
        MZTabException
        See Also:
        MZTabHeaderLineParser.parse(int, String, uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.utils.errors.MZTabErrorList), MZTabHeaderLineParser.refineOptionalColumn(uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.model.MZTabDescription.Mode, uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.model.MZTabDescription.Type, String)
